code: import axios from"axios";var BASEURL="https://www.googleapis.com/books/v1/volumes?q=";export default{search:function search(query){return axios.get(BASEURL+query);},saveBook:function saveBook(bookData){return axios.post("/api/books",bookData);},deleteBook:function deleteBook(id){return axios.delete("/api/books/"+id);}};
